name: californian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of California: By 2040, one out of two Californians will be Latino. Californian Glenn Martin designed and flew an airplane as early as 1909.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's only right that Californians should like California.15.7 million Californians were registered to vote in the primary.He is a prominent Southern Californian who teaches at universities across the region.

belonging or relating to the US state of California or its people: Surfing is probably the best-known Californian pastime. Very little remains to mark the existence of the Californian Native Americans.
More examplesFewer examplesCalifornian consumers and businesses complained about the lack of relief from high electricity prices. This Californian wine looks almost pink in colour.Brooke had been swimming in the Californian waters since girlhood.
